name: 战争螺旋
description:
"Spiral of War" is a thrilling bullet-hell shooter game infused with modern warfare aesthetics. This innovative title seamlessly merges the mystery of vampires, survival tactics of "Battle Royale", and the strategic combat of "League of Legends", crafting a brand-new combat experience. The end of each battle isn't just a conclusion; players' equipment, skills, and progression are synchronized online, leaving a unique imprint of every skirmish.

In every round of "Spiral of War", players are not just entering a simple duel. They will face adversaries from various backgrounds and styles, each possessing distinct combat strategies and techniques. Players must utilize wit and skill, engaging in intense, heart-pounding brawls with these foes. This is not just a game; it's a comprehensive test of courage, strategy, and combat prowess.

At launch, four factions will make their debut:

Mercenaries
China
USA
Russia
